title: Ticket #4130: job_dagman_propogate_priorities succeeds even if functionality fails
description:
The checking code in this test doesn't actually check that the priority values output by each node job are correct(!!!!). So if the propagation functionality is totally broken, the test still reports success.

Note: I found this by accident when working on gittrac #4102: Complete rescue DAGs have incorrect node priorities, so I'm working on it on the V8_0-gittrac_4102-branch branch.
check_ins:
2013-Dec-20 13:11   Check-in [39084]: Gittrac #4130: Fixed job_dagman_propogate_priorities.run so that it actually make sure the nodes have the right priorities. (By Kent Wenger )
